scripts.dev: node_modules/.bin/stylus --watch --out static static/index.styl & node_modules/.bin/pug --watch static --name-after-file --pretty --no-debug & node-dev ./server & wait
scripts.build: sh -c 'rm -rf build; mkdir build; cd build; electron-packager .. auditor --overwrite --platform win32 --arch x64 --asar; for i in *; do zip -r $i.zip $i; rm -rf $i; done'
